SEARCH

Class BookService

java.lang.Object
BookService
public class BookService extends Object
Service class that manages library books. Provides functionality to add, search, borrow, return, and persist books to and from files.
Version:
1.0
Author:
hoor

      public BookService()

  • Method Details

    • addBook

      public void addBook(Book book)
      Adds a new book to the collection.
      Parameters:
      book - the book to add
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if a book with the same ISBN already exists

    • searchBook

      public List<Book> searchBook(String query)
      Searches for books by title, author, or ISBN.
      Parameters:
      query - the search query string
      Returns:
      list of books matching the query

    • getAllBooks

      public List<Book> getAllBooks()
      Gets all books in the collection.
      Returns:
      list of all books

    • borrowBook

      public void borrowBook(Member member, String isbn)
      Allows a member to borrow a book. Sets the due date to 28 days from today.
      Parameters:
      member - the member borrowing the book
      isbn - the ISBN of the book to borrow
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the book is not found
      IllegalStateException - if the book is already borrowed, the member has unpaid fines, or the member has overdue books

    • returnBook

      public void returnBook(Member member, String isbn)
      Allows a member to return a borrowed book.
      Parameters:
      member - the member returning the book
      isbn - the ISBN of the book to return
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the book is not found
      IllegalStateException - if the book is not currently borrowed

    • findBook

      public Book findBook(String isbn)
      Finds a book by its ISBN.
      Parameters:
      isbn - the ISBN of the book
      Returns:
      the book, or null if not found

    • loadBooks

      public void loadBooks(String filename)
      Loads books from a file. Each line should be in the format: ISBN,Title,Author,Status where Status is either "available" or "borrowed:memberId".
      Parameters:
      filename - the file to load from

    • saveBooks

      public void saveBooks(String filename)
      Saves all books to a file. Each line is written in the format: ISBN,Title,Author,Status where Status is either "available" or "borrowed:memberId".
      Parameters:
      filename - the file to save to
